title: Can You Teach a Horse to Write? - Kinda Funny Podcast (Ep. 178)
description:
Go to http://www.stamps.com and use promo code KINDAFUNNY to get a 4-week trial plus free postage and a digital scale.

A Kinda Funny Best Friend thinks his wife is wrong for naming a horse what she did, so Greg, Nick, Andy, and SnowBikeMike debate the case and make the argument that horses deserve to be taught stuff in school.
